forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early. A mix of sun and clouds by afternoon. High 11C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear early then increasing cloudiness after midnight. Low around 35F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 54F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 59F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.
